Articles.Content:
Post your rants that make you go RAWR!

I\'ll start off...

COCA-COLA COMPANY!!!

Why can\'t I have Grape Fanta? Why can\'t I have Cherry Coke? Why? WHY? WHY!?!?!?...

Rawr!
I hate the hypocrisy in the first world societies.

Ascensiam said:

I hate the hypocrisy in the first world societies.

Duh... Second world FTW!

Knowledge time, WITH Grove!

[snip]

Edited April 11, 2019 by Dman979
Removed political content.

I hate the hypocrisy in the first world societies.

*Holds head in shame*

So, in school we\'re reading To Kill a Mockingbird. One of the main themes is discrimination, which is totally ironic. Anyone who doesn\'t participate in the school system is shunned by society [snip].

I\'ll expand on this later.

Edited April 11, 2019 by Dman979
Removed inflamatory content.

ok. so a guy at my school unfortunately passed today. i never knew him personally (he was at least 2 years older) and everybody is raving on facebook and twitter. it is sad, but i dont see why people who didnt know him (such as myself) are making such a big deal. we all know its sad, but deep down, they dont care.

I have a school project [snip] due tommorow, when we got about 2 days to work on it. The teacher also didn\'t announce the due date until today... Is it so hard to at least give us the weekend?

Edited April 11, 2019 by Dman979
Removed political content.

I rant on rants on rants.

What now?

Okay seriously now.

Conspiracy theorists.

I hate them, they always make far-fetched theories about [snip], whaaat. And about that one about the earth that doesn\'t move [snip].

Edited April 11, 2019 by Dman979
Removed political content.

Quote

I have a school project [snip] r due tommorow, when we got about 2 days to work on it. The teacher also didn\'t announce the due date until today... Is it so hard to at least give us the weekend?

Isn\'t it a little Ironic that a report [snip] is due on his birthday?

Edited April 11, 2019 by Dman979
Removed political content.
I wish people would stop being apathetic and actually do something. If you want to complain, be my guest, AFTER you did your part in trying to change things, freeloaders.
